suppress.notes: Suppress CVE-2025-15104 only when Dependency-Check maps a dependency to the generic CPE "validator:validator" (known false-positive for various *-validator libraries).

Suppress CVE-2020-29582 only when Dependency-Check maps a dependency to the overly broad Kotlin CPE "jetbrains:kotlin" (known false positive for kotlin-stdlib, kotlin-stdlib-jdk7, kotlin-stdlib-jdk8).
